com.googlecode.sarasvati.visual
Class AbstractProcessVisualizer

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.sarasvati.visual.AbstractProcessVisualizer

public abstract class AbstractProcessVisualizer
extends Object

Base class for a standalone process visualizer. Will show a list of available processes in the left pane, and a visualization of the selected process in the main pane.
To manage database connectivity, users should override init() and getSession().
For custom rendering of nodes, subclasses may also override getWidgetFactory().

Author:
Paul Lorenz
